document.full_text: brandon roy led the trail blazers to one of the greatest comebacks in n.b.a. playoff history, while the grizzlies beat san antonio in their first playoff victory on their home court.
document.title: roundup: big rally by blazers; grizzlies lead spurs, 2-1
lines_and_colors: brandon roy led the trail blazers to one of the greatest comebacks in n.b.a. playoff history, while the grizzlies beat san antonio in their first playoff victory on their home court.
